name: Square 'n' Balls
description:
A simple, yet challenging game! Jump with the square to make points while you avoid the balls and achieve a great position in the leaderboard!

Ten game modes await you:

* Ascension
* Freefall
* Rotation
* Pursuit
* Evasion
* Endurance
* Coordination
* Survival
* Perforation
* Maze

Play through each one of them to challenge yourself, sharpen your reflexes, time your movements and test your patience. Explore the most of Square 'n' Balls!
